verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, think on me, with care and woe oppressed, let me Thy loving servant be, and taste Thy promised rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, think on me, nor let me go astray; through darkness and perplexity point Thou the heav'nly way.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, think on me, that, when the flood is past, I may eternal brightness see, and share Thy joy at last.
